Title: Silkslug (The Shaw) [Beta]
Description:
Homage to a game, or maybe more, a game that sold dreams, hopes, but will never come to be.
This slugcat is a joke and i hope it becomes obsolete soon.

The [b]Slug Song[/b] skin is NOT made by me and was NOT made for this slugcat, it is just recommended for a more immersive experience and all credit goes to its creator.

The campaign of this slugcat is the hunter one (I didn't finish it).
The slugcat has been tested I believe.

Let's move on to abilities.
[list]
    [*]Any spears picked up by this slugcat will automatically be put on its back, this spear can only be removed by [b][DOWN + PICKUP][/b].
    [*]If both slugcats hands are empty you can use [b][THROW][/b] to attack with a slash, and by holding the button you can do a charge attack.
    [*]The slash direction works like a spear throw, and does everything you can expect: damage, pogo (no E Pogo), parry, plus a bit of stun.
    [*]By using [b][JUMP + PICKUP][/b] you can do a dash (with filled hands or not), the dash does the same damage as the slash but cannot parry projectiles.
[/list]

The [b]1.1.0[/b] update adds a new challenge at the end of your campaign.
The challenge is currently in beta so there may be bugs and compatibility issues, and change will maybe happen in the future.

If you find any bugs or crashes, don't hesitate to report them in [b]Bugs Reports[/b] with the [b]exceptionLog.txt[/b]  which you can find in your game folder.

Here the [url=github.com/Zeldack974/Silkslug]GitHub link[/url]

[/list]

Happy SHAW and GIT GUD.
RequirementNames: SlugBase, More Slugcats Expansion, RegionKit, Custom Regions Support
